actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the requirement that the taxpayer identification number of dependents be included on the return.

summary.text: Repeals a provision of the Internal Revenue Code that requires a taxpayer to include a tax identification number for each dependent of age two or older claimed on an income tax return.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the requirement that the taxpayer identification number of dependents be included on the return.
